title: Rural Livelihood Mission 1
summary: This policy aims to reduce poverty by enhancing employment opportunities in India.
goals: Target: Reduce poverty levels by 30% within 5 years.
full_text: This policy aims to reduce poverty by enhancing employment opportunities in India. Target: Reduce poverty levels by 30% within 5 years. Implementation partners include Ministry of Rural Development, NGOs.
